document_data.name: Marcabruk
document_data.mainbody: '''Marcabruk''' was the leader of the [[hybsil]] [[Autnak Tribe]] in [[Chondath]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.History: Marcabruk and his tribe in 1358 joined the [[Company of the Singing Dawn]], the [[Llandrydd's Steel]] group and [[Enhanen]]'s men in fighting the [[undead]] army led by the mad cleric of [[Tempus]] [[Theodoric]].
